topics.body: Speaking of Korra; I might have never gotten into it, but a change it brought about in cartoons was that usa cartoons can now have glbt in them.  Before Korra it was widely accepted that any cartoon featuring glbt would be censored and/or removed from broadcast through legal injunctions or such; now it's the show has shown that was a load of bullcrap spouted by "moral guardians".

topics.body:
"@hype":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/551894096368720819460100#post_551894096368720819460100
If we don't have any weeks without episodes between April 4 and the finale, then the season will end in September.

The wait between EqG1 and EqG2 was 15 months, and 15 months after EqG2 will be December 2015

So at MOST, we'll only have to wait 3 months after S5 ends
